title: Add CSC ID to centralized business content and render on Contact + Footer

requirements.summary: Add CSC ID to the centralized business content model and render it with an English label on the Contact page and in the Site Footer contact info section.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/content/business.ts` includes a new `cscId` field with the value "666236760012".
The Site Footer shows a clearly labeled line "CSC ID: 666236760012" in the Contact Info area.
The Contact page shows a clearly labeled line "CSC ID: 666236760012" within the contact information cards/section.
No existing business identity fields (name/owner/phone/address/WhatsApp) are removed or altered.

file_operations.description: Extend the exported `businessInfo` object with a new `cscId` field set to "666236760012", keeping all existing fields (name/owner/phone/whatsappNumber/address) unchanged.

Render the CSC ID from `businessInfo.cscId` as a clearly labeled line "CSC ID: 666236760012" within the existing "Contact Info" list/area in the footer, without removing or altering existing contact info lines.

Add a clearly labeled display of the CSC ID from `businessInfo.cscId` ("CSC ID: 666236760012") within the contact information section/cards, matching the current layout style and keeping all existing business info fields intact.
